title: Ashampoo Movie Studio v1 0 5 5-TE
description:
TE 2013 PRESENTS

ANOTHER FINE RELEASE

Release: Ashampoo Movie Studio v1.0.5.5 (c) 2013 Ashampoo
Date: 08/21/2013

Cracked By: Twisted EndZ
Release Type: Serial, Other: Server Check Bypass, RegFile
RELEASE NOTES

Making and editing home movies as it should be

Ashampoo Movie Studio includes everything you need to edit and
produce your home movies from start to finish in a step-by-step
fashion

Cut, trim and convert videos
Add background music
Apply transition effects and text overlays
Export to file or burn to disc

Everything out of the box

Ashampoo Movie Studio comes with all the features you need to
edit and produce your home videos

Cut and trim your movies down to size
Shorten scenes or cut them out entirely and get rid of unwanted
commercials

Blend scenes seamlessly together with transitions
Provide a seamless movie experience with smooth transitions
between scenes and add cinematic depth to your movies

State your point with text overlays
Make sure your viewers don't miss the message with scrolling and
animated texts

Play with lights and sounds
Use fine-tuned controls to adjust brightness, contrast and
saturation. Add background music and adjust volumes and playback
speeds. Apply subtle effects like Sepia to add more depth

Produce and publish your own masterpiece
When you're done editing, create your own movie disc right from
within Ashampoo Movie Studio and share your movie with your
friends and loved ones

No expert knowledge required
You don't need to be a professional to achieve
professional-looking results. Ashampoo Movie Studio follows a
self-explanatory step-by-step pattern that safely guides you from
start to finish

Requirements:

Operating System:
Windows XP, Windows Vista , Windows 7, Windows 8

Software:
Microsoft .Net 4.0 Framework
Windows Media Player 9

Computer:
Any computer that runs one of the above operating systems at a
reasonable speed

Graphics adapter:
1280 x 1024 min. resolution
DirectX 9 capable GPU with hardware pixel shader v2.0 and 128 MB RAM

Sound card:
Any standard card, internal or external

Memory:
2 GB of RAM
230 MB free disk space for program installation
1 GB free disk space for cache additional space for temporary files

For More Info on Ashampoo Media Sync Visit: <a href="
http://www.ashampoo.com/en/eur/pin/0082/Multimedia_Software/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.ashampoo.com/en/eur/pin/0082/Multimedia_Software/</a>
Ashampoo-Movie-Studio

SCENE NOTICE:

Upon Winrar 5 beta becoming final, TE is going to be using the
new RAR5 as the new standard for RAR required archival. The
benefits on using RAR5 is well worth the change. If you do not
upgrade to Winrar v5.xx, then you will NOT be able to extract
data from *.r?? files. Visit rarlab.com for more information on
the new format

TE Release Filename: tamvs12x.zip

INSTALLATION NOTES

Install ashampoo_movie_studio_e1.0.5_sm.exe. Do not launch
Ashampoo Movie Studio yet. Next import the registration.reg file
into your registry, which can be found in the Reg folder. Make
sure you have administator mode if you have problems importing
the regfile. Ashampoo Movie Studio is now fully registered and
activated!

Thats it! Enjoy
